channel.title: Can someone help me plz, i need help with a step to create my server
channel.description:
im trying to make a server, and i have to get my router ip and log onto it, i log onto my router but when i click advanced like the guide tells me to i dont see the form which i have to fill in like it says and i dont know what im doing wrong
______________________________________________________________________________________________ Now This Is What The Step I'm On Says
Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
Name: 1 IP address: 2 TCP Ports to open: 43594 UDP Ports to open: Inbound Filter: Allow All Schedule: Always

item.title: Can someone help me plz, i need help with a step to create my server

Specify which router, then i would go see if you were doing anything wrong. but as of now i have no clue what your saying.

item.title: Can someone help me plz, i need help with a step to create my server
item.dc:creator: @zezimamo zezimamo
item.description:
@zezimamo wrote:

im trying to make a server, and i have to get my router ip and log onto it, i log onto my router but when i click advanced like the guide tells me to i dont see the form which i have to fill in like it says and i dont know what im doing wrong

Now This Is What The Step I’m On Says

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Name: 1
IP address: 2
TCP Ports to open: 43594
UDP Ports to open:
Inbound Filter: Allow All
Schedule: Always
